class.name: RMLDocument
class.brief_description: Node for loading and manipulating RmlUi documents.
class.description: RMLDocument is the main node for loading and manipulating RmlUi documents.

method.name: as_element
method.description: Returns an [class RMLElement] element reference to the root element of this document.

method.name: create_element
method.description: Creates a new element and returns an [class RMLElement] reference to it.

method.name: load_from_path
method.description: Creates a new document and load the source from [param rml] which must be a valid RML document.

method.name: load_from_rml_string
method.description: Creates a new document and load the source from [param path].

method.name: update
method.description: Updates the layout of the document, use this to immediately retrieve layout info after updating elements.
